\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{tikz}

\usepackage[psfixbb,graphics,tightpage,active]{preview}
\PreviewEnvironment{tikzpicture}
\usepackage[margin=0in]{geometry}
\begin{document}
\pagestyle{empty}
\begin{tikzpicture}[scale=1]
\node[](0)at(0,0.0)
{\scalebox{1}{0}};

\node[](1)at(-1.0,1.25)
{\scalebox{1}{a0}};

\node[](2)at(1.0,1.25)
{\scalebox{1}{b0}};

\node[](3)at(-1.0,2.5)
{\scalebox{1}{a1}};

\node[](4)at(1.0,2.5)
{\scalebox{1}{b1}};

\node[](5)at(-1.0,3.75)
{\scalebox{1}{a2}};

\node[](6)at(1.0,3.75)
{\scalebox{1}{b2}};

\node[](7)at(0,5.0)
{\scalebox{1}{1}};

\draw(0.north)--(1.south);
\draw(0.north)--(2.south);
\draw(1.north)--(3.south);
\draw(1.north)--(4.south);
\draw(2.north)--(3.south);
\draw(2.north)--(4.south);
\draw(3.north)--(5.south);
\draw(3.north)--(6.south);
\draw(4.north)--(5.south);
\draw(4.north)--(6.south);
\draw(5.north)--(7.south);
\draw(6.north)--(7.south);
\end{tikzpicture}
\end{document}
